Marc Philipp wrote on 19.11.2012 23:54:
> @Matthew: You can use your own domain with GitHub [1] but I don't know
> if that is true for repos like http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/
>
> [1] https://help.github.com/articles/setting-up-a-custom-domain-with-pages

It's true. For example I'm hosting 
https://github.com/orfjackal/jumi/tree/gh-pages at http://jumi.fi/ and 
the same way I'm hosting also a couple of other projects. Just add a 
CNAME file with the domain name to the repository and set the DNS records.

-- 
Esko Luontola
